item.title: Install spark and hadoop in Windows 10
item.description: Install spark to run locally Versions Java java -version openjdk version "1.8.0_292" OpenJDK Runtime Environment (AdoptOpenJDK)(build 1.8.0_292-b10) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (AdoptOpenJDK)(build 25.292-b10, mixed mode) Scala sbt console Welcome to Scala 2.12.13 (OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM, Java 1.8.0_292). Spark Download from https://spark.apache.org/downloads.html Spark release 3.1.2 with hadoop2.7 folder downloaded and copied to C:\Spark\spark-3.1.2-bin-hadoop2.7. Add C:\Spark\spark-3.1.2-bin-hadoop2.7 to user’s PATH Hadoop Downloaded from https://hadoop.apache.org/release/2.7.7.html There’s hadoop-2.
